DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate patient adherence with discharge diabetes medications up to 120 days following pharmacist counseling during hospital stay about diabetes self management
DOC.brief_title: Bridging the Gap by Transitional Care
DOC.detailed_description: It is a prospective, randomized, controlled Study. Patients randomized in a 1:1 ratio to pharmacist counseling or standard of therapy prior to discharge. Standard therapy: Nurses distribute a education pamphlet on diabetes. Pharmacist Counseling includes but is not limited to: - Reviewing and explaining their medications (dosing, side effects, route) - Reviewing symptoms and complications of hyper and hypoglycemia - Defining glycemic & non-glycemic goal levels - Explaining the importance of compliance with medications & appointments - Educating on the basics of nutrition and physical activity
